bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I love sweet things. What am I?
I wiggle and crawl, then spin a cozy bed. When I wake up, I have wings instead! What am I?
I march in a line, carrying food back home. I am very strong for my size, you know! What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I work with all my friends

bug.question: I hop around, making music in the grass. My legs are long and green. Who am I?

hints.text: 🌿 I am usually found in fields.
🦵 I use my legs to jump really high!

bug.question: I have spots on my back, and bring good luck, they say. I help gardeners by eating little bugs all day! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 My shell is red or orange.

bug.question: I light up the night with my tiny lamp. People catch me in jars to bring to summer camp. What am I?

hints.text: 🌙 I am most active at night.

bug.question: I spin a sticky web, but I'm not an insect. I have eight legs. Who am I?

hints.text: 🏠 Some people are afraid of me

bug.question: I have a long, thin body and many legs. I crawl in the dark, and I give some people the creeps. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I live under rocks and logs.

bug.question: I am known for my beautiful wings and a name that suggests distress, but I am a strong flier. What am I?

hints.text: 🦋 My wings are orange and black.

bug.question: I blend in with leaves, looking just like a twig. I stay very still, so you won't see me give a big.

hints.text: 🌳 I look like a part of a tree.
🍃 I am a master of disguise.

transport.question: I have wheels and carry people. I travel on roads and often stop to pick up more people. What am I?

hints.text: 🚌 I am bigger than a car.
👨‍👩‍👧‍👦 Many people can ride me at once
📍 I usually follow a set route.

transport.question: I have two wheels, you sit on a seat, and push pedals with your feet. What am I?

hints.text: ➿ You need to balance to ride me.
🧑‍🔧 I can have gears to make riding easier.
🔔 I often have a bell to ring.

transport.question: I travel on tracks and carry many people from town to town. What am I?

hints.text: 🛤️ I need special roads to travel on.
📣 I often make a loud 'choo-choo' sound.
⏱️ I usually run on a schedule.

transport.question: I fly in the sky and take people to faraway places. What am I?

hints.text: ✈️ I am faster than a car.
💺 You need a ticket to ride me.

transport.question: I travel on water and can carry many people or cargo. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I might have a horn to signal.

transport.question: I have a bucket or platform to lift people very high, often to fix things. What am I?

hints.text: ⚙️ I am often powered by hydraulics.

transport.question: I have a siren and flashing lights, and I rush to help people in emergencies. What am I?

hints.text: 🚒 I carry water to put out fires.

transport.question: I am a type of train that runs underground in a city. What am I?

hints.text: 🌃 You can find me in big cities

transport.question: I have a propeller on top, and I can take off and land vertically. What am I?

hints.text: 🚁 I can hover in the air.
📍 I do not need a long runway.

transport.question: I use rockets to travel to space. What am I?
